content: After the war, Helen returned to her husband, Menelaus, who was overjoyed to have her back. According to some versions of the myth, Menelaus forgave Helen for her infidelity and they lived the rest of their lives together. In other versions, though, Menelaus was so angered and embittered by Helen's betrayal that he almost killed her upon her return. Nevertheless, in most versions, Helen is reunited with Menelaus and they return to Sparta together.
